sentence.Network_en: Jack is still glooming over his coffee at the way he had been tricked.
sentence.Network_cn: 杰克一边喝着咖啡,一边还在闷闷不乐地回忆自己当时受骗的那种情况.

sentence.Network_en: They help you see past the clouds on a glooming day, they bring sunlight everyday.
